# Life Meets Pixel

> A geek culture review website covering video games, movies, TV series, anime, books, comics, board games, and gadgets. Reviews include scores from 1-10 with detailed analysis, pros/cons, and structured metadata.

Life Meets Pixel provides in-depth reviews and news for gaming and entertainment enthusiasts. Each review includes a numerical score (1-10), editorial analysis, and type-specific metadata (platforms, runtime, page count, etc.).

## Content Types

- Video Games: Reviews of PC, PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo, and mobile games
- Movies: Film reviews with runtime, director, and cast information
- TV Series: Television show reviews with episode and season details
- Anime: Japanese animation reviews
- Books: Book reviews with page count and author information
- Comics: Comic and graphic novel reviews
- Board Games: Tabletop game reviews with player count and playtime
- Gadgets: Tech and gaming accessory reviews

## Review Score Guide

Reviews use a 1-10 scoring system:
- 9-10: Masterpiece - Essential, genre-defining content
- 8-8.9: Excellent - Highly recommended with minor flaws
- 7-7.9: Great - Solid content worth experiencing
- 6-6.9: Good - Enjoyable but with notable issues
- 5-5.9: Average - Mediocre, for dedicated fans only
- Below 5: Not Recommended - Significant problems
